Module com.example.cs230assignment
Package com.example.cs230assignment

Class Board

java.lang.Object
com.example.cs230assignment.DrawShape
com.example.cs230assignment.Board
public class Board extends DrawShape
Class that models the board which is drawn on the canvas for the user to play on.
Author:
Thomas McAuley

      Construct the board with to be played on.
      Parameters:
      width - the width of the board
      height - the height of the board
      tiles - the arraylist of tiles to be drawn on the board
      player - the player to be drawn on the board
